title: GitHub Copilot Repository Reference
body: GitHub Copilot repository contains the official documentation, examples, and resources for GitHub Copilot. Covers setup, configuration, best practices, troubleshooting, API documentation, and integration patterns. Essential for understanding Copilot features, usage guidelines, and staying updated with latest capabilities.
